description: Bright, charming studio apartment in the heart of Prospect Heights, Brooklyn. Blocks from the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and dozens of spots to eat and drink! Convenient access to the 2, 3,4 5, and B/Q lines, to get you all around town and into Manhattan. The apartment has beautiful wood floors and is full of natural light
name: Studio Apartment Prospect Heights
review: Very easy walking distances to public transport and loads of great places to eat near this Airbnb - 10 seconds from the front door to 10 minutes and the choice is fantastic - hostess also gave great info on this. Super convenient and compact space, even for a studio. Clean and tidy.
